Everytime I buy a different jockey underwear than the previous one from online

comfortable. What else do you want?

might think its a other type of elastic which look premium.But its not the
case, both the thighs you will see the cheap elastic ,the cloth is not plan
over the elastic its like extra..... which to me does not give a good feeling.
